Posts.Content: Atb1201 wrote: Hi,  I was diagnosed in May with breast cancer. Had a lumpectomy and a auxiliary node dissection. Tumor was 2.5 centimeters. One of the 5 nodes removed had a micrometastsis. Er+ Pr- Her2-. Oncotype ex score of 21.  I finished the adriamycin and cytoxen (sp?) regimen and started the taxol and have completed 9 of 12 treatments I have developed neuropathy in my feet. Oncologist and Neurologist are discussing the possibility of stopping treatments depending on the nerve conduction test.  Had anyone else stopped early? I’m so concerned about the chemo not being effective enough if I stop early. Btw I am 58 years old. Besides this the side effects from the taxol have been minimal.  Any feedback would be spp Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Stopping Taxol Early Atb1201 muska
